trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data stored per-thread.
trans-unit.target: 指定按线程存储的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Provides thread-local storage of data.
trans-unit.target: 提供数据的线程本地存储。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>：

trans-unit.source: With the exception of <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Dispose" />, all public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 除<see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Dispose" />，所有公共和受保护的成员<see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" />是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。

trans-unit.source: The value returned for the <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> and <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.IsValueCreated" /> properties is specific for the thread on which the property is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值<see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" />和<see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.IsValueCreated" />属性是特定线程在访问属性时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The default value of `T` is used to initialize the instance when <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Value%2A> is accessed for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 默认值`T`用于初始化实例时<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Value%2A>首次访问。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor with a value of `false` for the `trackAllValues` argument.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数等效于调用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>构造函数的值与`false`为`trackAllValues`自变量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to track all values set on the instance and expose them through the <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Values" /> property; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果跟踪实例上的所有值集并通过 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Values" /> 属性将其公开，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance and specifies whether all values are accessible from any thread.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例并指定是否可从任意线程访问所有值。

trans-unit.source: If `trackAllValues` is `false`, only the value of this instance for the current thread is accessible.
trans-unit.target: 如果`trackAllValues`是`false`，但只可访问当前线程在此实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Values%2A> property to retrieve all values throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Values%2A>属性来检索所有值，则将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Func`1" /> invoked to produce a lazily-initialized value when an attempt is made to retrieve <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> without it having been previously initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Func`1" /> 之前尚未初始化的情况下尝试对其进行检索，则会调用 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> 生成延迟初始化的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance with the specified <paramref name="valueFactory" /> function.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <paramref name="valueFactory" /> 函数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="valueFactory" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="valueFactory" /> 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Func`1" /> invoked to produce a lazily-initialized value when an attempt is made to retrieve <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> without it having been previously initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> 之前尚未初始化的情况下尝试对其进行检索，则会调用 <see cref="T:System.Func`1" /> 生成延迟初始化的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to track all values set on the instance and expose them through the <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Values" /> property; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果跟踪实例上的所有值集并通过 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Values" /> 属性将其公开，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance with the specified <paramref name="valueFactory" /> function and a flag that indicates whether all values are accessible from any thread.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <paramref name="valueFactory" /> 函数和指示是否可从任意线程访问所有值的标志初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: If `trackAllValues` is `false`, only the value of this instance for the current thread is accessible.
trans-unit.target: 如果`trackAllValues`是`false`，但只可访问当前线程在此实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Values%2A> property to retrieve all values throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Values%2A>属性来检索所有值，则将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="valueFactory" /> is a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="valueFactory" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 释放该 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>。

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 方法使 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether this method is being called due to a call to <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否由于调用 <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Dispose" /> 的原因而调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 释放该 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most of the members of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>, this method is not thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数的成员不同<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601>，此方法不是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 释放该 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> is initialized on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否在当前线程上初始化 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: true if <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> is initialized on the current thread; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 如果在当前线程上初始化 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" />，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of this instance for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前线程的此实例的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The result of calling <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> on the <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> 调用 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method forces initialization for the current thread, as is the case with accessing <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Value%2A> directly.
trans-unit.target: 就像访问情况一样，调用此方法强制当前线程，初始化<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Value%2A>直接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> for the current thread is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 当前线程的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> 为 null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: The initialization function attempted to reference <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> recursively.
trans-unit.target: 初始化函数尝试以递归方式引用 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: No default constructor is provided and no value factory is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 没有提供默认构造函数，且没有提供值工厂。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of this instance for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前线程的此实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the object that this ThreadLocal is responsible for initializing.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 ThreadLocal 负责初始化的对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: If this instance was not previously initialized for the current thread, accessing <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Value%2A> will attempt to initialize it.
trans-unit.target: 如果此实例未以前初始化当前线程，访问<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Value%2A>将尝试对其进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: If an initialization function was supplied during the construction, that initialization will happen by invoking the function to retrieve the initial value for <xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始化函数已提供的构造过程中，通过调用要检索的初始值的函数来发生初始化<xref:System.Threading.ThreadLocal%601.Value%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the default value of will be used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将使用的默认值。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown, that exception is cached and thrown on each subsequent access of the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发异常，缓存并在每次后续访问的属性上引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The initialization function attempted to reference <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" /> recursively.
trans-unit.target: 初始化函数尝试以递归方式引用 <see cref="P:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: No default constructor is provided and no value factory is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 没有提供默认构造函数，且没有提供值工厂。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list for all of the values currently stored by all of the threads that have accessed this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前由已经访问此实例的所有线程存储的所有值的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list for all of the values currently stored by all of the threads that have accessed this instance.
trans-unit.target: 访问此实例由所有线程存储的当前的所有值的列表。

trans-unit.source: Values stored by all threads are not available because this instance was initialized with the <paramref name="trackAllValues" /> argument set to <see langword="false" /> in the call to a class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 所有线程存储的值均不可用，因为此实例通过将 <paramref name="trackAllValues" /> 参数在对类构造函数的调用中设为 <see langword="false" /> 进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadLocal`1" /> 实例。
